title: Help us, Rina-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Ahh~...... This bread is so good......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ahh~...... This bread is so good......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hey Chika-chan, how were your final exams?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ehehe~...... I hope I’ll be let off with a warning from Dia-san! What about you, Honoka-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I hope I’ll be let off with a warning from Umi-chan and Eli-chan~ Ahaha!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Sigh......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Sigh......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I wish we could go to a world line where we don’t get the exams back.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>We should see if we could ask Rina-chan to make a time machine~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>.....See if we could ask? The odds of her already developing a time machine are even higher than the odds of us getting scolded.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Alright..... Let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
